description:
Alluxio Enterprise Edition (AEE). 

 Alluxio, formerly Tachyon, is the world's first system that unifies disparate storage systems at memory speed. With Alluxio, enterprises can manage data efficiently, accelerate business analytics, and ease the adoption of hybrid cloud. 

 Please refer to https://alluxio.com/docs/enterprise/1.5/en/Alluxio-on-DCOS.html for a detailed operation guide. 

 Release Notes: Version 1.1.0-1.5.0 includes several new features as well as usability improvements. - Deploy Alluxio Enterprise Edition v1.5.0 - Configure HDFS under storage in High Availability (HA) mode - Improved configurability - Improved error reporting - Deploy Alluxio in offline-mode for environments without external connectivity - Deploy kerberos authenticated Alluxio 
 Version 1.0.0-1.4.0 of the DC/OS Service is the first release of this capability. With this integration, you can deploy Alluxio in minutes and realize fast on-demand analytics. Choose between command line and GUI based installation to suit your preferences.
name: alluxio-enterprise
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Alluxio is being installed!

	Documentation: https://alluxio.com/docs/ 
	Issues: info@aluxio.com
preInstallNotes: Please visit https://alluxio.com/products to obtain a license for Alluxio Enterprise Edition. Visit https://alluxio.com/docs/enterprise/1.5/en/Alluxio-on-DCOS.html for a detailed installation guide.
